snippet: A 1950s ranch nestled in a quiet valley in Bel Air, Calif., is reimagined to fit the needs of a blended family that includes six children.
abstract: Robin Maguire and Marc Schaberg have renovated a 1950s ranch home in Bel Air section of Los Angeles, to accommodate their modern sensibilities and a blended family that includes six children who live with them part-time; able to keep 95 percent of the original structure, the couple were able to create a four-bedroom, three-and-a-half bath home with an open floor plan to accommodate their large gatherings.
lead_paragraph: A 1950s ranch nestled in a quiet valley in Bel Air, Calif., is reimagined to fit the needs of a blended family that includes six children.

headline.main: Home Renovation for a Modern Family in Bel Air
